mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Congressman Moore with John R. Hoblitzell
mdRecord.dcterms:description: John R. Hoblitzell, son of the late John D. Hoblitzell, former U.S. Senator, gets a few tips from Congressman Arch A. Moore, Jr. in the congressman's Washington office. Hoblitzell spent several days as a summer intern in Moore's office prior to representing West Virginia at Boys' Nation.
